div.p: rough draft to BEGIN TO identify synonym group members for analysis, based on CL etc. 18.11.2003. CH ／ LU JIANMING

note.p: 1. When referring to humans, WL claims these are synonymous. This is not so for many interesting reasons. In 追我者誰也？they are certainly not interchangeable, shu2 孰 not being able to function predicatively.

2. Much more importantly, the two are not interchangeable in the following, where the pronoun shu2 孰 creates a comparative context in a way that she2i 誰 does not. Indeed, this is the basis semantic difference between the words:
孰疏孰親？ who then is distant, who close?

3. Only she2i 誰 can be followed by zhi1 之, where it is by no means always clear how "personal" or "personified" the subject is, although WL are right, of course, that in general the reference is human or personified:
吾不知誰之子， One does not know not whose son it is.
4. Note that in the following the two question particles are not at all interchangeable. 誰好學 "who likes study" is not the same as 孰好學 "who is most fond of study":
「弟子孰為好學？」 "Of the disciples, which one is most eager to study?"

bibl.title: 古漢語常用詞同義詞詞典

sense.def: who is it; who was it?; who could it be?
who? (non-contrastive, i. e. not: "which of these listed possible subjects") but typically: whoever? what kind of person?
who among them?, which one?; (contrastive) who?
who? Cao Cao: 胡肯 "who is willing?"
不知其誰 “did not know who thaat was": predicate noun question word: who
whoever? i.e. no one! 非x而誰？
who Tao Yuanming 哲人伊何
be what kind of person? be who?
who? 文選：此何誰？； 吳越春秋：為何誰
who? 晉書：何誰最不肖也。
who of the relevant people> who? i.e. no one! 非x其孰， 天下其孰
其誰堪之"who would e able to bear it": who? i.e. no one!
晉大夫其誰先亡 "who of the dignitaries of Jin will perish first?": who from among the N
怒者其誰 "who/what is it that blows?": is who or what?, who is there?
who？ TT: 啊誰要你夫妻？
who (of the explicit or implicit topics) is more V
who? (but note that the modal force of 其 is mostly present!!)

bibl.title: Studies in the Language of Zǔtáng jí 祖堂集

note.p: Early examples in SANGUOZHI. The colloquial interrogative pronoun is frequently used in the dialogues of ZTJ.

sense.def: who is it? (could maybe also be interpreted as NPpro with deleted verb)
who? 世說新語: 是何物人？
be who? 搜神記：汝何等人； also with copula: 房主是何等人？
